A not-for-profit organisation which provides a range of housing and support services for people with a learning disability, including registered care, supported living services and a transition service for 16-19 year olds. Places a particularly strong emphasis on person-centred support and individually designed packages of support for people with complex needs and behaviour that challenges services. This company is registered and inspected by the Care Quality Commission (CQC), to make sure they provide a quality service.
Offers advice and support to people who receive direct payments. Helps individuals to manage their care budget. Will also recruit a personal assistant and employ a personal assistant.
